Class AbstractLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.layout.AbstractLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Layout
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleLayout, ForceScanAlgorithm, ForceTransferAlgorithm, FRLayout, GEMLayout, ImprovedPushForceScanAlgorithm, ISOMLayout, KKLayout, RandomLayout, SALayout, TimGALayout, TreeLayout

    public abstract class AbstractLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements Layout
    This is an abstract class for a layout algorithm.

    Ming-Hsien Tsai
